basic.description: A detailed study of organic reactions and processes of industrial and economic importance, with application of the principles developed in ENCH 245 (CHEM 245). Case studies involving process development in the pharmaceutical industry are used extensively.
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Applied Organic Chemistry II

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: ENCH 245 or CHEM 245 or permission of the department. Must also be registered in BSCE.
